title: Members of the Thai Royal family call on President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) A delegation of Thai Royal family members including Princess Soamsawali who are on a tour in Sri Lanka paid a visit to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on 01 November. The meeting was arranged just after President Rajapaksa arrived in Sri Lanka after…
